program: Master of Science in Computer Science

toefl.notes: Minimum scores: Writing 25, Speaking 24, Reading 21, Listening 17.

gre.notes: GRE is required and is a critical part of the evaluation process.

description_for_vector_db: [Program Focus] UCLA's MSCS is known for its strong focus on AI, Bioinformatics, and Computer Systems. [Location Advantage] Located in Los Angeles, students have access to the growing 'Silicon Beach' tech scene. [Research & Industry] The program offers both thesis and comprehensive exam options, catering to both research-bound and industry-bound students. [Admission Insight] Very high GRE quantitative scores are expected. The committee values strong mathematical foundations and analytical skills.
